Subject: Re: East and West
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron looks up at the metal goliath Predaking, he remembered seeing,
from behind the eyes of Galvatron, the raw power he was capable of
displaying, but he stood his ground, he was not willing to show them fear.
"Galvatron was a fool, to waist your talents" Megatron shot the words from
his mouth with contempt. In three short years, Galvatron successfully
destroyed everything he had taken millions of years to build.
